titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to modernize the physician self-referral prohibitions to promote care coordination in the merit-based incentive payment system and to facilitate physician practice participation in alternative payment models under the Medicare program, and for other purposes.
Medicare Care Coordination Improvement Act of 2019
Medicare Care Coordination Improvement Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Medicare Care Coordination Improvement Act of 2019
This bill exempts certain alternative payment models under Medicare from the general prohibition on physician self-referrals (i.e., the Stark law).
